name: Call of Outlaws
description:
Explore a truly enormous Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits. Realistic great story.

STORY MODE
It had been five years since I had left my weapon. I had retired from bounty hunting, and become the man of the house. My farm, my cows, my wife and our unborn child… Everything was so beautiful. Actually it was too beautiful for a cowboy whose life had always been involved with foulness. That Willy Young has kidnapped my wife. Only you can help me, my lad.

TRAINING MODE
It's a great place to learn how to use a gun.


GAME FEATURES
- More than 10 weapons
- Realistic cowboys, bandits
- Realistic horse riding
- Realistic Wild West
- Amazing 3D graphics
- More than 15 language support


Notice: Some products are sold with real money in the game.


You can reach us for any questions or problems on help@zuuks.com.
